channel.title: quantum on Alejandro R. Urzúa
channel.description: Recent content in quantum on Alejandro R. Urzúa

item.title: There are something like classical deaths and revivals, just like in the atom-field interactions?
item.description: Maybe it’s a tricky question $$\ddot{q_{i}}(t) = -(k_{i} + k_{i+1})q_{i}(t) + k_{i+1}q_{i+1}(t) + k_{i}q_{i-1}(t)$$
